content: The product title "Big Boys Long Sleeve Full Zip Hoodie" does indicate a specific gender, as it is tailored towards boys. However, one review title that positively indicates gender neutrality could be "Cozy and stylish hoodie for kids" or "Great quality hoodie for children". A quote from a review that supports gender neutrality could be "This hoodie is perfect for any child, regardless of gender. It is comfortable and well-made, and the sizing is true to size."
